TEXT.TITLE: NASA SELECTS LOCKHEED <LK> FOR SPACE STATION
TEXT.BODY: Lockheed Corp said NASA selected it to develop and design software for the Space Station in a contract with a potential value of more than 200 mln dlrs. Lockheed said the contract will continue into 1993 when assembly of the station in a 200-mile earth orbit is scheduled to begin. Reuter
